title: REACTION: Congress Warns Palantir CEO of CRIMINAL Liability!

So I want to get into it and really

and Palanteer is tied up in it. But I

what they're doing with the Trump
administration. And in this video, we're

would I'd be fine sharing my opinion.

they're stating against Palanteer, but
that's the premise here. I don't agree
